#Text=The Miami Heat defeated the New York Knicks , 119 - 98 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday evening .
#Text=The Heat ( 39 - 33 ) came into the contest with a markedly better record than their opponent , but also likely with a wary eye .
#Text=The Knicks ( 26 - 46 ) were likely to have at least a bit of a spoiler mentality , and they certainly would n't have minded extending a modest two - game winning streak , either .

#Text=Whatever concerns Miami may have had seemed to play out in a first quarter where New York hung with them bucket for bucket , but the home squad began to exert its will and superiority in the second .
#Text=A 37 - point surge on their part afforded them a 17 - point halftime lead , an edge they 'd kicked up to 22 by the end of the third period .
#Text=That guaranteed that simply treading water over the final 12 minutes would do the trick , and sure enough , the Heat finished with a 21 - point margin of victory .

#Text=Despite having played a grueling double - overtime marathon against the Nuggets just two nights prior , the hosts still saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column , with the second unit contributing an impressive 62 points .
#Text=Miami was also highly efficient , draining 56 percent of their 81 attempts .

#Text=One player who always seems to bring the goods each night for the Knicks irrespective of circumstance is Enes Kanter , and accordingly , he led the way with a 23 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two steals .
#Text=Michael Beasley unsurprisingly played well against the team that originally drafted him , managing 22 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal .
#Text=Trey Burke produced a bench - leading 16 points and supplemented them with seven boards and two assists .
#Text=Tim Hardaway , Jr. poured in 12 points and also supplied three rebounds , one assist and one steal .
#Text=Emmanuel Mudiay drew the start at point guard and shot just 3 - for - 10 on his way to eight points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals .
#Text=Tyler Johnson and Kelly Olynyk paced the Heat with matching 22 - point tallies from the first unit and bench , respectively .
#Text=Johnson also mustered two rebounds and two assists , while Olynyk dished out 10 assists , ripped down five rebounds and recorded one steal .
#Text=Wayne Ellington generated 16 points , four boards , one assist and one steal .
#Text=Justise Winslow finished with 15 points , two assists and one rebound .
#Text=Goran Dragic registered 14 points , five assists and two rebounds .
#Text=Josh Richardson delivered 12 points , five assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block .
#Text=James Johnson could n't come anywhere near his 31 - point explosion against Denver on Monday , totaling just three points , six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block .
#Text=The Knicks return home and tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday evening , while the Heat pay a visit to the Oklahoma City Thunder on that same night .
